{"id":1037544959,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 6 days","timestamp":1693562557,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1037544959/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int res = (s.length() > 0);\n        int left = 0, right = 0;\n        unordered_map<char, int> m;     \n        \n        while (right < s.length()) {\n            // find the repeated character\n            if (m.find(s[right]) != m.end()) {\n                res = max(res, right - left);\n                left = max(left, m[s[right]] + 1);\n                m[s[right]] = right;\n                right++;\n            } \n            // no repeated character\n            else {\n                m[s[right]] = right;\n                right++;\n            }\n        }\n        res = max(res, right - left);\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
